title: Showing Your True Colors
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Nico, what are you looking at?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Social media. I’m organizing my recipes for homemade sweets.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Oh, I see. Maybe I’ll make something on the next holiday too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What do you think about this one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>...Wow, that looks delicious! Chocolate muffins!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>There aren’t a lot of ingredients, so it’s pretty simple. You mix everything together and just bake it. Kokoro and the others like it so I recommend it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>...I see. You were looking at recipes for them. Fufu, you’re such a good older sister, Nico-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Th-That’s not true!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Okay, okay. Oh yeah, want to go shopping with me on the way home today? I want to buy ingredients to make some sweets for Arisa.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I guess I have no choice. I just happened to be thinking of going shopping too, so I’ll go with you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
